subject: Hockey, Ice
Death and Dying
Widows and Widowers
lead_paragraph: The morning after her husband’s funeral, Pat Burns’s widow discovered that her car had been broken into and valuables including his collection of autographed hockey sweaters had been stolen.
snippet: The morning after her husband’s funeral, Pat Burns’s widow discovered that her car had been broken into and valuables including his collection of autographed hockey sweaters had been stolen.
